about.title: My story
about.body:
Hi, I’m Caroline. After years working in insurance and finance, I decided it was time to do something that felt meaningful, not just “a job”. I retrained in facials and holistic wellbeing because I love the way a calm space and the right treatment can change how you feel.

Everything I do is gentle, thoughtful, and tailored. Some people come purely for relaxation. Others want support as their skin changes with stress, hormones, or life events. I also offer supportive, comfort-first treatments for clients navigating recovery after cancer treatment. Whatever has brought you here, you’ll be welcomed, listened to, and never rushed.

Pure Glow Wellness is my umbrella for three strands: facials (open now), corporate wellbeing, and PT for women navigating midlife and menopause (coming later as I complete my training).
about.closing_line: If you’re not sure what you need yet, just message me. I’ll help you choose what’s right.

strands.title: One umbrella, three strands

cards.title: Pure Glow Facials (open now)
cards.copy: Relaxing, skin-supporting facials tailored to your needs on the day. Calm, holistic, and never routine.

cards.title: Pure Glow Corporate
cards.copy: Wellbeing sessions for workplaces, designed to help people reset, de-stress, and feel looked after during busy periods.

cards.title: Pure Glow PT (coming later)
cards.copy: Strength and confidence-focused training for women, especially around midlife and menopause. I’m currently training and I’ll share details here when I’m ready.

strands.note: Right now, facials are my focus. The other strands are being built carefully, not rushed.
